name: Parrying Dagger
description: Not really meant for attacking, you are not even sure how you got it.
tooltip: You take 10% less slashing damage while wielding this weapon.
Slashes (70%): Deals 2-6 + 5 * DEX bonus slashing damage.
Stab (30%): Deals 1-6 + 5 * DEX bonus piercing damage. This attack has a +5% critical chance.
